nodes.text: Tilossa's residence was a three storied prefabricated building that was used as Tilossa's home and base of operations. It was stolen from a colony ship that was headed to the Unknown Regions.
The first floor was used as a barracks for Tilossa's personal security force.
The second floor had meeting rooms and an apartment for the Water Boss Tanse.
Tilossa had his elaborately decorated living quarters on the third floor. There was also a kitchen and dining area on the floor.
